title: Please give me my 6300 ip back from fucking over my champ.
body:
i bought zack with IP and some skins for other chars with riot points and paid for skins please refund me for zack since you decided to change him and i do not like the change. The zack i know and love is now gone and i would like my IP back for you changing him. i should not have to suffer a loss of IP for changing a champion and now i deal with the new game play.

If you change a champion please allow an IP refund for the the changed champion that has been changed for players that do not like the changed champion!!{{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}}

replies.body: Seeing as how I'm not wrong, my point stands. Riot is not going to give a refund for one champion because they will have to do it for all champs that people aren't happy with.

Oh dear, people on these boards...

If you bought a supreme pizza because you like supreme, thoroughly enjoyed half of it and decided to save the rest for later, opened up your fridge tomorrow and found some devious pizza vendor snuck in and replaced it with an extra spicy Hawaiian pizza, how would you feel?

Myself, I'd be pretty irked. I paid for a full supreme pizza and only got to enjoy half of it. If it weren't spicy I might have welcomed the variety.

Same concept here. It's not an unreasonable expectation to expect some form of compensation for radical changes to what you paid for.

Seeing as you can't even spell his name correctly, I don't think you deserve the refund.
